name: Variances and exemptions
text: [§340E-3]  Variances and exemptions.  The director may issue variances or exemptions from the regulations issued pursuant to section 340E-2 under conditions and in a manner consistent with the public interest; however, such variances or exemptions are not permitted under conditions less stringent than the conditions under which variances and exemptions may be granted under the Federal Act. [L 1976, c 84, pt of §1]
